website_summaries.verdict: Looking for quick, quality results? Look no further than pHat 5.5.
pros: You will notice a serious reduction in redness almost immediately
This formula is gentle and doesn't irritate sensitive skin
Actively works to calm the pain, flakes, and bumps that often come with rosacea
A little product goes a long way, one 4oz bottle will likely last 3-4 months
We loved the long list of safe, natural ingredients
cons: Product has a strong earthy smell

customer_reviews.title: Titanium Dioxide
customer_reviews.text: Last time I get caught up in the glitz of the advertising of a product. Label showing all ingredients is not shown. I was not that impressed with the product and finally looked at the label and was stunned to see Titanium dioxide as one of the ingredients. Go to their website and you can see it. If I would have know I would not have purchased it. Even though this is a controversial ingredient, many companies are removing it from their products. I dont care if it "might" not penetrate healthy skin, if I cant breathe it, its just not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Helping  red nose.
customer_reviews.text: Just started using. Feels very nice on my nose skin (only trouble area) and helps reduces the redness. I look less like Rudolph now.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne W. Kalk

customer_reviews.title: Dried face out and caused rosacea pustule breakouts
customer_reviews.text: This dried my combination skin out (to the point of flakiness even in the hot summertime with regular moisturizer use) and caused rosacea pustule breakouts. It seems like I am in the minority so far as this product's effectiveness goes, but it definitely made things worse for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Bird That FlewTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as ERA Organics face wash
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as ERA Organics face wash. I thought these would be the exact same product but it's not. This product is a little bit too gentle, although my face has not been irritated, my acne has gotten a bit worse. I need to wash 2x a day and moisturize 2x a day with this wash; the Era Organics stuff did not make me break out even if I only washed once a day. However, it's always amazing for me to find something that doesn't make me red and itchy immediately so I'm grateful for that at least! This will continue to be my "backup wash" when I run out of the other stuff.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used long enough to rate the effectiveness yet
customer_reviews.text: I've begun using this product to see if it will help with my rosacea. It's only been a few days, so I'm still hoping to see some improvements in the rosacea. I would like to say, though, that I really dislike your plastic bottle. Please, please redesign. I use your conditioner for my hair, too, and with both products, it is almost impossible to get them out of that little spout in the lid. It is especially bad trying to get the thick conditioner out.
customer_reviews.author: canda siggler

customer_reviews.title: Face feels clean & refreshed with 1-2 drops
customer_reviews.text: I'm always Googling around to find any type of product that would help for Rosacea. I came across Gentle & Moisturizing Rosacea Wash in Amazon. I ordered the smaller bottle. When I received it I thought how tiny; probably won't last more than 1-week, 2x per day. Not true at all; to my surprise only one drop on your finger tips, gently rub around on a damp face & neck creates a wonderful lather. My face felt clean & refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Try This First!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that a face wash could do much to clear up my pink, peeling cheeks. It seemed like everything I tried made it so much worse. I saw noticeable results after the FIRST WASH! And my face was clear after the second wash! I couldn't believe it. The results were truly amazing. I HIGHLY recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: My go-to cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for a while and I keep buying more. That says a lot about how I feel. With rosacea you much be careful with washes and creams that irritate sensitive skin. I love this is that I feel my face is really clean, but it never had that tight, dry touch after. I recommend it to other people with sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My roseaca was so bad I was ashamed to leave my home
customer_reviews.text: My roseaca was so bad I was ashamed to leave my home. Within the first few hours after the first use the inflammation started to go away. It’s been a week since I started using this and my face is almost completely clear and the pain is gone too! I feel and look like myself again. I will be using this product for the rest of my life. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria B.

customer_reviews.title: It's a winner
customer_reviews.text: This is not strong enough to take all the makeup off, but I use it after a facial soap. I think it helps to balance the ph. And cuts down on break out.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: It has sulfur, that's good. It doesn't have enough of to make a difference. Ends up being average face wash, not really doing anything more that mild cleanser. For results grab prescription wash.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Works better that the RX medication!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second bottle of the wash that I have bought - it really clears up my face. My rosacea is hereditary, my father and sister also have it. This is the only thing that works for me. I will be a loyal customer as this works better than the stuff that my dermatologist prescribes for me.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Casperson

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Face & Body Wash
customer_reviews.text: I have an autoimmune skin disease and rosacea plus my skin is very sensitive. I have no problems with itching or redness that I have with other products. It's the only thing I use on my face and body.
customer_reviews.author: Judith L.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It did not burn my skin when I washing my face. However, after three days of using their rosacea wash, deep cleanser and rosacea lotion, my face felt tight and itchy (especially near my noes). My face got even more red than usual. I believe there are better non burning, natural cleansers out there. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Maria M. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: At 1st it seemed like it worked
customer_reviews.text: But then it did nothing else... I had high Hope's for this product..
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: This face wash is great for reducing the red
customer_reviews.text: This face wash is great for reducing the red. My skin really does great with this one. I have tried many different washes and would recommend this one to anyone with sensitive rosacea skin, it really calms it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product worked slowly and effectively.
customer_reviews.text: When my M.D. did not offer a remedy (suggesting not his field) for mild rosacea, I looked up the condition and it seemed there is NO remedy, but then found this product. Within a short time, perhaps 2 weeks, the redness began to abate, and now, still using it morning and evening, there is NO inflammation, just smooth normal skin. Glad I tried it.
customer_reviews.author: moodylonerphile

customer_reviews.title: I returned
customer_reviews.text: Another product that I continue to read on the reviews I returned because I didn’t dare to use on my face
customer_reviews.author: ana

customer_reviews.title: Super drying
customer_reviews.text: This might be for some but not me. I have combo skin with rosacea and bumps. This wash dried my skin out horribly and caused more break outs after using it for a week. Ill not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works well.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered several bottles of this and it seems to really help my rosacea related acne. It is a little drying, but i have really dry skin. I justbuse a light moisturizing lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Kati b

customer_reviews.title: Fan for life
customer_reviews.text: I am a repeat customer with the PHat 5.5 Rosacea wash and cream. I have suffered from rosacea for years and it’s embarrassing. I’ve tried $200 products that did nothing, and than I discovered this product on Amazon. What’s another $28? This is the only products I’ve tried that even put a dent in the rosacea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and could not use this. Made me breakout, also made my skin hot and itchy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It is an amazing product. I mainly bought it for my rosecea and it actually works really good, but I also noticed that it restores my skin, and the dark marks from the sun around my eyes has disappeared little by little! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Enamorado

customer_reviews.title: Major worsening!
customer_reviews.text: I experienced a major worsening of my Rosacea from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, gentle
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! After dealing with acne rosacea for a few years and worshipping pHat 5.5’s Rosacea Cream for the past year, I decided to match my daily cleanser with my daily moisturizer. It’s lightweight, gentle and much more affordable than what I’ve been getting from my dermatologist.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: this is very gentle on the skin especially when dealing with skin that is breaking out.
customer_reviews.text: I used this in combination with another product that I would put on after washing my face with this.
customer_reviews.author: Reliable Utilities Services

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my Mom who has Rosacea, and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Mom who has Rosacea, and her skin has really improved! I buy it for her ever time she runs out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So gentle for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This face wash is not only gentle, but takes off all makeup and oil at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Konrath

customer_reviews.title: Mild cleanser
customer_reviews.text: The wash is mild, non irritating and provides abundant sudsing. Unfortunately the issue of Rosacea on my face was unaltered. I continued to use the products as a mild cleanser, but I don’t recommend specifically to clear or eliminate rosacea.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: This made my face dry and itchy
customer_reviews.text: Supposed to be for sensitive skin but it irritated my face.
customer_reviews.author: valerie klasinz

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product works well for my face and Rosatia symptoms.
customer_reviews.author: Patty D.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is the only face wash I’ve found to work with my skin. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Rasah Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Amazing difference in your complexion.
customer_reviews.text: The look of my skin from just one time of using was such a great difference. I really like the product.

customer_reviews.title: that you are dealing with a reputable company
customer_reviews.text: liked both the wash and cream...does what it says will do

customer_reviews.title: redness faded after each use
customer_reviews.text: I used it as my face had red spots from the sun but after using they have faded away.

customer_reviews.title: Best cleanser I have used with my super sensitive
customer_reviews.text: Best cleanser I have used with my super sensitive, rosacea prone skin. I won't use any other cleansers but this one!

customer_reviews.title: Recommended highly
customer_reviews.text: Product works well, use as a daily scrub. Keeps redness and rash at bay!!

customer_reviews.title: Being confident
customer_reviews.text: I used it on my face for Rosacea! I LOVED it! It made my face so smooth & I don't turn red like I used toxc

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash for rosacea or sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: Good face wash for rosacea. Smells great versus other washes I've tried. Is very gentle on my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Erickson

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. It works great
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It leaves my face feeling soft and moisturized. Will order this again in the future

customer_reviews.title: No more redness! Effectively removes makeup too
customer_reviews.text: Finally my redness is gone!! I was getting desperate because everything I used made my skin flare up, but this is fantastic and acrtually removes makeup too

customer_reviews.title: Really like
customer_reviews.text: I like this face wash that's really help me my rosacea my face redness is almost gone really like it

customer_reviews.title: Love the feel of this face cream
customer_reviews.text: This cream has made a huge difference in my rosey face skin tone.

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have seen a positive response of my skin to product.
customer_reviews.author: Аmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: gentle
customer_reviews.text: seems to be gentle & I like it so far..
customer_reviews.author: shirrell austin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's slow going but I do see a difference. My face is not so red.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Tool for fighting rosacea
customer_reviews.text: Being newly diagnosed with rosacea, I was anxiously researching what tools to use for combating it. I took a chance with this wash and can happily say that it was a good choice. I suppose that it is the honey that leaves a comfortable film of moisture on my skin. That is very important to consider, besides other treatment qualities. Having had acne during my whole life, I long ago learned to use minimal skin cosmetics. This one is a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Smith

customer_reviews.title: good for VERY sensitive Rosacea, can't use any products available in drug stores etc.
customer_reviews.text: I can't use most products that say they are for Rosacea. This is working. This is the best face wash I’ve found for redness but mainly for acne associated with Rosacea. I’ve been using for well over a year.
customer_reviews.author: scottierazor

customer_reviews.title: Best wash I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a strange rash on my face for about a decade. Recently it just turned from just redness to extreme dryness that nothing could soothe or moisturize. I finally came across phat 5.5 rosacea wash and cream and it is the only thing that works. And it works very, very well. Not only is it efficacious, but it is cruelty free and vegan, which makes me very happy. I have also tried their shampoo and conditioner. It is a truly wonderful and effective product line.
customer_reviews.author: MissAlison

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem to work for us
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both have problems with our face. We both have very light skin. I have red splotchiness on my face mainly on my cheeks. This face wash unfortunately hasn't made any difference. It feels like it cleans which is nice and may work for someone else but No changes for me. :-( It's not that I think it's a bad product, it just doesn't seem to work for us.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and effective.
customer_reviews.text: This face wash leaves my rosacea-challenged skin feeling clean and supple, not tight or dry. I use it with my Clarisonic gentle brush head, and it lathers nicely and rinses thoroughly. While I take care to not let it get into my eyes, I can lather my eyelids with no sensitivity issues. I do not notice a difference in the redness, but the texture of my skin is smoother, without flakiness, and with fewer acne outbreaks. I have put pHat 5.5 Rosacea Wash on "Subscribe and Save" now.
customer_reviews.author: H2Ouzel

customer_reviews.title: Great facial cleanser for those with rosacea
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product to try because the one I was previously using appears to no longer be sold. Have had rosacea for years, and need to use a very mild and comforting facial soap. I've been using this product for a few days, and is very creamy, and comforting to the skin.
customer_reviews.author: FKB

customer_reviews.title: Gentle for my face.
customer_reviews.text: I have rosacea so many cleansers are very irritating. This is very gentle for my face.
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I started using this before my dermatologist knew I was using something OTHER than her recommendation. She has now agreed with me that this product out shines many other available rosacea facial washes that she has seen on the market
customer_reviews.author: bonomo

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This is the only face wash I use on my rosacea. Hasn’t improved it but it has not worsened and I don’t break out in bumps while using it.
customer_reviews.author: L.C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I think this company is a good one. I like this cleaning product for my sensitive skin. I'll be looking for more items from them.
customer_reviews.author: maxie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a staple in my skincare now. Wonderful product, really lovely facial cleanser. Works really great on rosacea and sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Franco

customer_reviews.title: This works.
customer_reviews.text: I had rosacea really bad. I tried several different products, and some helped a little but not enough. then i tried this product. It works great. All of my redness and bumps are gone. I have it on auto ship to ship to me every 6 months. I used it twice a day to start and now use it once a day on a regular basis. Solved my problems.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Willy

customer_reviews.title: Very mild product. It probably can't hurt as a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very mild product. It probably can't hurt as a rosacea treatment, but not sure it helps either. It was not expensive so worth trying for people who are doing everything possible to help rosacea breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Corley Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Best roseacea wash I’ve found.
customer_reviews.text: Finally found one that works. Tried those expensive ones like R&F and they weren’t even as good as this. And this will Last about 3-4 months

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I used this product every day and didn't notice any changes. May work for some people, but not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This has worked wonders for my skin. I have been using for 4 months, really controls my acne and keeps the redness down. After 4 months have decided to try their face moisturizer as well, hope it works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: helps with Rosacea
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have a pleasant smell but it's not awful or strong either. I love it because it's helping with my rosacea a lot!

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very gentle yet effective face cleaner. Using for a week and my rosacea is looking better.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This is working. I have incredibly sensitive skin, rosacea symptoms. This is making my skin happy! I'll keep using it.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Have seen no change yet, I was hopeful :/ waste of money.

customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. I have extremely sensitive skin and this stuff does wonders for my needy skin.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: After I started using this wash my skin looks much better. My redness has lowered down.

customer_reviews.title: Nice stuff
customer_reviews.text: I like this stuff. I only wash my face with it. I have slight roscea and this seems soothing and non-irritating. I'll buy some more. It does not dry out my face either.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I have mild rosasea and this is the only face wash that doesn’t dry out or irritate my skin. I’m so thankful I found it!

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product! I have spent hundreds of dollars trying to find something for my skin and then I found this. I also like that is not tested on animals

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Been using for over a week and it seems worse than before.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, I think...
customer_reviews.text: I think I like this product, but I haven't been using it long enough to say for sure. I have been using it for about a month, but had a big rosacea breakout this month so I am stopping the product and once that clears up will try again. When I first started using it I thought it was helping, and the breakout could be unrelated (I was traveling and there were a lot of weather changes). I will update this review once I have tried again.
customer_reviews.author: Angelbis

customer_reviews.title: My wife love it. So if you have Rosacea this is ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. My wife love it. So if you have Rosacea this is a great product to us. Cost less than the demonologist.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this line of product as I have extremely sensitive skin. used it for three days and my skin broke out. Disappointed as there are few products I can use due to my sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Works well and no irritation!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't mean to order this product but another one that is similiar by the same people. At any rate this worked well for me to. I have no issues with this wash. It didn't irritate my skin or Rosacea. It cleaned my skin well. No major scent. I would use it again, I just prefer the other product more.
customer_reviews.author: Missa

customer_reviews.title: rosacea face wash
customer_reviews.text: Quite frankly I only got it the other day so I can't give an honest report. Too soon. I'm hopeful that it will do the trick

product_meta.title: Moisturizing Rosacea Face & Body Wash for Sensitive Skin With Coconut Oil, Manuka Honey and Aloe Vera - Gentle Rosacea Cleanser for Dry & Itchy Skin - Redness Relief for Face & Body (4 oz)
feature_bullets: BEST NATURAL ROSACEA SKIN CARE. We target all the signs and symptoms for optimum results.
HIGHEST QUALITY ORGANIC aloe vera, manuka honey, cehami, plumeria, olive, coconut and hempseed oils.
FAMILY-OWNED with 3 generations making our own natural products in the US – Products You Can Trust.
NO WATER, NON-ALLERGENIC, PARABEN-FREE, FRAGRANCE-FREE, SULFATE-FREE, NEVER TESTED ON ANIMALS.
CLEANSE AND NOURISH YOUR SKIN. Our formula is deeply nourishing, get fast relief from redness and dryness while cleansing.
